table.name: vtiger_gpt_config
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_gpt_config` ( `id` int(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `provider` varchar(50) default NULL, `isactive` int(1) default NULL, `org_id` varchar(255) default NULL, `api_key` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index_id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_gpt_logs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_gpt_logs` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `requested_user` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `requested_on` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `provider` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `gpt_prompt` longtext, `gpt_response` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4, `tokens_consumed` text DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
